(2-ϵ)2<x<(2+ϵ)2: (Square all)
4-4ϵ+ϵ2<x<4+4ϵ+ϵ2: (Expand)
4-(4ϵ-ϵ2)<x<4+(4ϵ+ϵ2): (Rewrite in the desired form)
